name: TRI-COUNTY ELECTRIC COOPERATIVE
sampleDescriptions: Educating policymakers on the impacts of extreme weather events on electricity generation in Texas.
Educate policymakers about impact of energy rate spike due to 2021 winter storms.
Educate policymakers about impact of energy rate spike due to 2021 winter storms; support relief for electric cooperatives.
